string.text: Two small skewered tushkanos, grilled and seasoned with salt and chili pepper. The cheapest hot meal available in the Zone.
A small hot meal of grilled dog chops mixed with garlic, peppers and mushrooms. A cheap alternative to the more popular boar beef.
Portion of grilled pseudodog meat chops. Good nutrition value due to thick muscles of the animal.
Slices of fat and greasy bacon made from mutated pigs commonly known as fleshes.
A small portion of boar meat, grilled and seasoned with salt and mixed with peppers. The most popular warm meal among stalkers.
A small hot meal made from bloodsucker meat spiced with chilies and mixed with mushrooms.
A portion of grilled chimera meat, served with mushrooms and spices. An expensive meal, eaten most commonly by veteran Stalkers to celebrate accomplishment of difficult missions.
